description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Cubism takes the puzzle genre to a new dimension.  Solve exciting and fun cube puzzles in an easy, yet challenging, intuitive way.  Drag pieces onto a cube shape to solve the three dimensional puzzle. Choose between three playing modes, including more than 50 levels, a puzzle and a free form mode.  Choose piece type, cube shape and texture to play your unique puzzle.
description.short: Cubism takes the puzzle genre to a new dimension.  Solve exciting and fun cube puzzles in an easy, yet challenging, intuitive way.  Drag pieces onto a cube shape to solve the three dimensional puzzle. Choose between three playing modes, including more than 50 levels, a puzzle and a free form mode.  Choose piece type, cube shape and texture to play your unique puzzle.
